description: This is a market on predicting the statements made by Trump during a town hall event in North Carolina.

markets.description:
Donald Trump has scheduled a town hall on October 4 in Fayetteville, North Carolina (see: https://event.donaldjtrump.com/events/president-donald-j-trump-to-host-a-town-hall-in-fayetteville-nc).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump says "border" 20 or more times during their appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "border" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to a political boundary between nations.

If this candidate does not appear at this event, or if the event is otherwise cancelled or delayed beyond October 4, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the video of the event.
markets.question: Will Trump say "border" 20 or more times during North Carolina town hall?
